cta.title: هل أنت مستعد لرفع اتصال عملك؟
cta.description: اكتشف كيف يمكن لـ Meseji تحويل مشاركة العملاء الخاصة بك.

hero.title: قم بتوصيل واشتباك وتنمو مع WhatsApp
hero.subtitle: طريقة سلسة للتواصل مع العملاء باستخدام حلول التسويق متعددة القنوات.

howDo.title: المزايا
howDo.description: تجربة قوة Meseji - حيث يفي الابتكار البساطة.

broadcast.title: إذاعة
broadcast.description: زيادة المشاركة والتحويلات وولاء العملاء مع التواصل المخصص.

automation.title: الأتمتة
automation.description: قم بإنشاء مهام سير عمل مخصصة مصممة حسب احتياجات دردشة العمل الخاصة بك لعمليات سلسة.

tracking.title: التتبع
tracking.description: راقب سلوك العملاء ، وأداء الحملة ، والدردشة ، ومقاييس المبيعات في الوقت الفعلي.

crm.title: CRM
crm.description: تفاعلات العملاء ، وتفضيلات ، وشراء السجل لتقديم تجارب شخصية.

service.title: Broadcasting Made Easy with Meseji
service.description: Simplify your customer communication with Meseji's broadcasting tools. Create, schedule, and send messages across multiple channels effortlessly while tracking performance and automating responses.

service.title: WhatsApp Business Flow Builder
service.description: Automate customer interactions on WhatsApp with our drag-and-drop flow builder. Simplify workflows, integrate with CRMs, and enhance engagement with automated responses.

service.title: Shared Inbox for Teams and Businesses
service.description: Streamline team collaboration with Meseji's shared inbox. Manage customer conversations, assign tasks, and organize messages to improve customer satisfaction.
features: Manage all customer conversations in one place

service.title: Seamless Meta Ads Integration
service.description: Manage and optimize your Facebook and Instagram ad campaigns effortlessly with Meseji. Create engaging ads, track performance, and maximize your ROI.

solutions.title: حلول WhatsApp شاملة
solutions.description: تجربة رسائل WhatsApp سلسة مع خدمتنا عالية الجودة وفعالة من حيث التكلفة.

revolutionary_project.title: المشروع الثوري
revolutionary_project.description:
الخطة والهيكل يعملون كيف تريد. 
تنظيم المهام بسرعة.

app_integrations.title: تكامل التطبيق
app_integrations.description:
جمع كل أدواتك وبياناتك معًا. 
انضم أيضًا إلى مئات التطبيقات الأخرى.

data_reporting.title: الإبلاغ عن البيانات
data_reporting.description: احصل على نظرة ثاقبة في الوقت الفعلي على التقدم وتسمح للفرق بتتبع عادات عملها.

workflow_builder.title: منشئ سير العمل
workflow_builder.description: العمليات الآلية لتنسيق فرقك وزيادة التواصل.

blog.title: كن ذكيًا ، وفر الوقت
blog.description:
احصل على أحدث المقالات حول النمو والتسويق والبث والتفاعل والإنتاجية التي يتم تقديمها مباشرة إلى صندوق الوارد الخاص بك. 
احصل أيضًا على المعرفة حول WhatsApp Business API و chatbot والمزيد.

form.label: Email address
form.info: انضم للحصول على تحديثات مجانية كل أسبوع

articles.title: 10 Proven Strategies for Bulk WhatsApp Messaging
articles.description: Bulk WhatsApp messaging is an incredibly effective tool for reaching your customers directly and driving sales.

articles.title: Top 5 Use Cases for Bulk WhatsApp Messaging
articles.description: WhatsApp is a powerful tool for businesses to connect with customers.

articles.title: Do's and Don'ts of Using WhatsApp API for Business
articles.description: Businesses are constantly looking for innovative and efficient ways to reach and engage with their customers.

example.title: 10 استراتيجيات مثبتة لرسائل WhatsApp بالجملة
example.description: تعتبر Messaging WhatsApp Bulk أداة فعالة بشكل لا يصدق للوصول إلى عملائك مباشرة وقيادة المبيعات.

example1.title: أفضل 5 حالات استخدام لرسائل WhatsApp بالجملة
example1.description: WhatsApp هو أداة قوية للشركات للتواصل مع العملاء.

example2.description: تبحث الشركات باستمرار عن طرق مبتكرة وفعالة للوصول إلى عملائها والتفاعل معها.
example2.title: لا تفعل ولا تفعل استخدام واجهة برمجة تطبيقات whatsapp للعمل

home.title: Why WhatsApp?
home.description: WhatsApp is the most popular messaging app in the world.

integrations.title: App Integrations
integrations.description: Over 20 top applications can be effortlessly integrated with Segment. You can also create your own custom integrations.

slack.title: Slack
slack.description: Slack is a messaging app for teams. It brings all your team's communication and files in one place, where they're instantly searchable and available wherever you go.

salesforce.title: Salesforce
salesforce.description: Salesforce is a customer relationship management solution that brings companies and customers together. It's one integrated CRM platform that gives all your departments — including marketing, sales, commerce, and service — a single, shared view of every customer.

hubspot.title: HubSpot
hubspot.description: HubSpot offers a full platform of marketing, sales, customer service, and CRM software — plus the methodology, resources, and support — to help businesses grow better.

zendesk.title: Zendesk
zendesk.description: Zendesk is a service-first CRM company that builds software designed to improve customer relationships. As employees, we encourage each other to grow and innovate.

intercom.title: Intercom
intercom.description: Intercom is a Conversational Relationship Platform (CRP). With Intercom, you can build better customer relationships through personalized, messenger-based experiences across the customer journey.

mailchimp.title: Mailchimp
mailchimp.description: Mailchimp is an all-in-one Marketing Platform for small business. We empower millions of customers around the world to start and grow their businesses with our smart marketing technology, award-winning support, and inspiring content.

zapier.title: Zapier
zapier.description: Zapier moves info between your web apps automatically, so you can focus on your most important work. It integrates with over 2,000 apps.

segment.title: Segment
segment.description: Segment is a customer data platform that makes good data accessible for all teams. It helps teams harness the power of their data, so they can build better products and grow faster.

shopify.title: Shopify
shopify.description: Shopify is a commerce platform that allows anyone to set up an online store and sell their products. Merchants can also sell their products in person with Shopify POS.

wordpress.title: WordPress
wordpress.description: WordPress is open source software you can use to create a beautiful website, blog, or app.

googleSheets.title: Google Sheets
googleSheets.description: Google Sheets is a web-based spreadsheet offered by Google as part of their Google Drive service. It makes it easy to create, edit and collaborate with others from your phone, tablet or computer.

contacts.title: Contact Us
contacts.description: Get in touch with us for any queries or support.

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are a team of developers who are passionate about building software that makes a difference. We believe in the power of technology to change the world and we are committed to building software that helps people.
